data.text: @ParsianaMedia They want to  hold the family of deceased at ransom in such time advised to mend ways towards humanity

@ParsianaMedia I would expect the trustees to be aware that by mid-2020 it was known that the ailment, 'covid19', bypasses 98% of all people and that, by January 2021, the recovery rate of the remainder was >96%.
Hence, on what ground can this ritual duty be refused?
